1501920.name: Toewr le Fence [DISCONTINUED]
1501920.description:
TOEWR LE FENCE HAS BEEN DISCONTINUED

This game was quite literally my first baby steps in game development. Nothing was organized and I quite literally had no idea how to code. This was also made back when I was like 6th grade LMFAO (I'm not even kidding I literally feel so bad for those of you who bought this disaster of a game)

Welp, it's been a good 7 years since I made TLF (at the time of editing this). I've gotten exponentially better at Unity Engine (and Godot Engine :P), and programming in general. And all of that stemmed from Toewr le Fence.

So - I'd like to thank each and every one of you who supported my very first steps into the world of game development. I'm so sorry that you had to buy such a crappy game, but making this game brought me nothing but a good experience. Said experience will stick with me for all future projects I'll be working on!

The source code is available through my website. Check it out if you want to mess around with it urself (TL;DR idc what u do with the code u can sell it if u want. just credit me or smth. i also don't care if u don't cuz I'm too lazy to hire lawyers lmao)

Meanwhile, I'll be working on better and more exciting stuff. Also check them out on my website :D
